name: HumanJamDev.2022
description:
An arcade game I created for my first GameDev Jam[I did this game in 6 days] (GameDev.tv Jam 2022).

You control a God that takes part in a humanDev Jam, to make a simulator of application of the human world, where the intention is to find a solution for the elderly humans population.

You act as the god of death so that humans can start over in the circle of life.

                                                                            

controls:

W : wake up

A, D : change screen

E : make humas start for the beggining
